info.title: üè† Home Task Management API
info.description:
API for managing family tasks (OData + JWT + DTO)

üìò **OData supported:** `$filter`, `$orderby`, `$select`, `$top`, `$skip`, `$count`

üß© Examples:
- `/api/Families?$orderby=CreatedAt desc`
- `/api/Families?$filter=Address eq 'Hanoi'`
- `/api/Tasks?$filter=Status eq 'Pending'`
